page.title: 11The New Nettlebed Fete
page.content: The fete has taken place every year in July.The fete was opened in 1976 by Mr Michael Heseltine, the local M.P. There is a competition for the cover of the programme, you have to draw a picture of something in Nettlebed or something in the fete. Last year we had Derek Nimmo and this year 1985 Doctor Who will open the fete.These people are television stars.Each year we have a competition for the best float.This year there will be a new competition,a six-a-side soccer tournament for the under elevens.There is a BMX club coming to do some stunts on bikes.Theres lots of stalls and food for sale. The fete is now run by the Nettlebed Sports Association. The money raised at last years fete went to pay for a drainage system for the football pitch. The money raised this year goes to the Childrens Playground.
